## Linear algebra warmup

Alwayss use rows x columns for linear algebra even though you shall forget lol. Let

$$
A= \begin{pmatrix} 
1 & 1 \\
1 & 2 \\
1 & 3
 \end{pmatrix}, 
B=\begin{pmatrix} 
4 & 7 \\
1 & 2
\end{pmatrix}, 
x=\begin{pmatrix} 
4 \\
2 \\
 \end{pmatrix}, 
I_3= \begin{pmatrix}
1 & 0 & 0 \\
0 & 1 & 0 \\
0 & 0 & 1
\end{pmatrix} 
$$

Compute each of the following, or specify not possible

$$
A+A
$$

```{r}
1 + 1
```
